feed.title: E. Aakash
feed.subtitle: Let us explore the domain of Web develpment using jekyll.

entry.title: A new page
entry.content:
Seems you have reached the second page of the WebSite.

Just got to know that to create a new page in the website, all you have to do is creating a markdown in _posts.

Cool… Isn’t it?
entry.summary: Seems you have reached the second page of the WebSite.

entry.title: Everything has a Beginning
entry.content:
I’m E. Aakash. A complete web novice.

Today I began this jekyll web project and created this website. I wish to add more blogs into this website as soon as I learn new things in Web Development.

So, lets together begin this journey to the world of Web development and discover the unknown…
entry.summary: I’m E. Aakash. A complete web novice.
